example.payment.jbricks
Class Screen

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
          example.payment.jbricks.Screen

public class Screen
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas

This class handles and coordinates most of the drawing for this game. It knows how to draw the splash, menu and game over screen, as well as the actual games screen. It also forwards 'cooked' key events to the Engine class.
